original_prompt: Extract named entities and classify them (Person, Location, Organization, etc.).
optimized_prompt:
<instructions>
    <objective>
      Improve the guidance for an LLM to transform input texts into structured outputs that classify named entities effectively.
    </objective>
    <steps>
      <step>1. Identify and extract named entities from the provided input text.</step>
      <step>2. Classify each identified named entity into one of the following categories: Person, Location, Organization, or Other. Ensure each entity is accurately categorized.</step>
      <step>3. Structure the output in a list format, showing each entity followed by its classification in parentheses.</step>
    </steps>
    <example>
      <input>EU rejects German call to boycott British lamb. Peter Blackburn BRUSSELS 1996-08-22 The European Commission...</input>
      <output>[("EU", Location), ("Peter Blackburn", Person), ("BRUSSELS", Location), ("European Commission", Organization)]</output>
    </example>
  </instructions>
